itinerary.mapNote: Aït Bougmez 'Happy Valley' entry. Berber shepherds. 2800m.
High plateau approach. Rose valley views. 3600m.
After Jbel Mgoun 4071m summit. East descent. 3200m.
Road end. Vehicle to Kelaa des Mgouna. 1600m.

waypoints.name: Jbel Mgoun Summit
waypoints.note: Highest peak in High Atlas east of Toubkal. Long summit day.

waypoints.name: Aït Bougmez Valley
waypoints.note: 'Happy Valley'. Traditional Berber mud-brick villages. Trek start.

waypoints.name: Tarkeddit Plateau
waypoints.note: High plateau above treeline. Snowfields possible year-round.

waypoints.name: Kelaa des Mgouna
waypoints.note: Valley of roses below. Rose festival each May. Trek end.
